ComicInfo.Title: Sandstorm; First Impressions; Falling Star; Do or Do Not; Slippery Slope; Lucky Stars
ComicInfo.Summary:
Princess Leia's first meeting with Emperor Palpatine and Darth Vader.
A bounty hunter tracks Luke to the planet Dagobah.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-13 06:14:46. [CVDB97458] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 08:48:05. [Issue ID 215000]
